information:
The Prince is the only son and successor 
of late King Krichevskoy, dood! 
And an autocratic egotist, dood!

His Evility 
can boost the ability of any party members, which is very useful, dood! 
And it's easy to boost the damage of his Skill, dood!

He's a straight-hearted young man 
who's not good at telling lies and dealing with girls, dood. 
He seems to be in love with Rozalin, dood.

He has very hihg HP and ATK, dood!
His Evility that boosts Fist-equipping characters 
is also excellent, dood!

He's the current Dean of Evil Academy, dood. 
With a 1.8 Million Evil Quotient, 
he conducts evil research all day long, dood.

His Evility that weakens enemy defense 
is powerful and easy to use 
as it does not get affected by party setup, dood!

He's a Prinny Instructor in Hades, the nether prison, dood!
However, his true identity is a vampire who loves sardines... 
The most powerful vampire formerly known as the "Tyrant", dood!

He's got a vicious Evility that greatly increases 
the physical attack of sword-equipping characters, dood. 
His Skill can heal while dealing damage, dood!

He has a history of being a lone avenger 
after his loved one being taken from him, dood. 
But now, he's a fighter with excellent cooking skills, 
thanks to the encounter and friendship with his companions, dood!

He's got top-class attack, 
and a strong Evility that greatly boosts 
the physical attack of fist-equipping characters, dood!

A sheltered princess who was raised as the only daughter of the Overlord, 
a naive, domineering young lady, dood! 
She seems to be in a relationship with Adell as a lovey-dovey couple, dood.

She's a charming lady with high speed and magical attack, 
along with the Evility of boosting the physical attack of male characters, dood! 
So go get married, you lovey-dovey couple, dood!

She's the branded delinquent since the foundation of Evil Academy, dood. 
Her delinquency is legendary. She's doing volunteering works everyday, 
like fundraising, blood donation, cleaning, and whatnot, dood.

Her Evility that raises the defense of the party 
is easy to use regardless of the situation, dood! 
And she's got top-class magical attack, dood!

She is the ultimate weapon 
created to destroy the world, dood. 
She's been practicing hard to become the strongest final boss, dood!

She's an excellent attacker with 
available-from-start AOE skill and an Evility 
that boosts the abilities of monster units, dood!

As the Princess Overlord of the Gorgeous Netherworld, 
she's the most wealthy one among the three worlds, dood. 
It's said that all men will be fascinated and become her servants, dood.

Her Evility can make hereslf stronger 
if there are more male characters in the party, dood! 
And she's got top-class SPD, dood!

She's an angel from the Celestia who wants to become an Overlord, dood. 
She loves her brother, Prince Laharl, and us Prinnies. 
And she's a solid, hard-working person, dood! A REAL angel, dood!

She can use AOE attack and healing skills, 
her Evility could boost the magical attack of party members. 
And she loves Prinnies! PERFECT, dood!
